title: Legacy Client issues
body: The new client is really glitchy for me so i relied on changing back to the legacy client for the highest quality. However two days ago my client randomly changed to the really old client (not the one before the most recent update). This client doesnt have the option to open hextech crafting or even open my friends list or notifications. Just wondering how to revert back to the client that was used before the most recent update. Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for the delayed response.

This is a pretty common issue with the old client, the way to resolve this is to [run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).

Let me know if you're still experiencing issues.
